pages.text: $(li)Pufferfish are passive mobs found in $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/ocean)Oceans$(/l).$(br)$(li)They defend themselves by dealing damage and inflicting $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/poison)Poison$(/l) effect to nearby creatures including you.$(br)$(li)These creatures inflate themselves when approached by you, most creatures and $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/armor_stand)Armor Stands$(/l).

They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bone_meal)Bone Meal$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bone)Bones$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/pufferfish)Pufferfish (Item)$(/l) on death.
